General.Name: Knusford Bhd
General.Description: Knusford Berhad, an investment holding company, provides machinery, equipment, reconditioning workshop and transportation services in Malaysia. It operates through Trading, Property Development, Investment Property, Construction, and Services segments. The company engages in sale of light and heavy machinery; and trading of building materials and sand, as well as develops residential and commercial properties. It also offers rental of investment properties; construction of civil works contracting and landscape construction; and rental of machineries and equipment, as well as provides transportation, project management, and landscape maintenance services. Knusford Berhad was formerly known as Wengcon Corporation Berhad and changed its name to Knusford Berhad in April 2000. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
